post:
We provide managed Windows and Linux VPS hosting solutions that are based on Cloud architecture with Cpanel and Plesk control panel and many more options. We are giving you one month free hosting on semi-annual VPS hosting plan. If you opt for our annual plans you get 2 months hosting free.

Linux VPS Servers:

VPS Standard:

• HDD: 25 GB
• Bandwidth: 600 GB
• RAM: 1.5 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $29.99/month

VPS Enterprise:

• HDD: 45 GB
• Bandwidth: 1 TB
• RAM: 2 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $49.99/month

VPS Corporate:

• HDD: 65 GB
• Bandwidth: 2 TB
• RAM: 2.5 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $69.99/month

Windows VPS Servers

• Price: $39.99/month

VPS Enterprise:

• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $59.99/month

VPS Corporate:

• HDD: 65 GB

• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $79.99/month

Operating System:

• Linus OS: CentOS / Fedora / Debian / Ubuntu

Control Panels:

• CPanel/WHM with Softaculous: $8.00

• Software Firewall + Anti-Virus: Symantec Endpoint Protection: $8.00
